texture_flush: This function can be used to "flush" a texture page or a group of texture pages, ie: remove them from VRAM when no longer required. You supply the unique texture page ID (as returned by the texturegroup_* functions) to flush a single page, or you can supply a texture group name (as defined in the Texture Group Editor) to flush all the texture pages in the group.
The texture page ID (an integer) or a texture group ID (a string)

{ANY_CODE} var _tex_array = texturegroup_get_textures( "MainMenu");
for (var i = 0; i < array_length(_tex_array); ++i;)
{nbsp_x4}{
{nbsp_x4}texture_flush(_tex_array[i]);
{nbsp_x4}}
The above code will flush all the texture pages under the texture group "MainMenu".
